channel.title: R Markdown on bad to the code
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on bad to the code

item.title: google location tracking
item.description: Biking to work this week I was wondering if I had not gotten slower and if my commute was not taking longer than before. Not being a regular user of Strava or a similar app, I wondered if I could find an answer to that question using my Google location history. So I downloaded the data, that comes in json format, and had a go at it. You can download your Google location data from your Google account.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
